page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content: On Canna and Sanday there are 17 buildings with roofs on which are or have been houses.Their current use is as follows: 6 are permanently occupied 2 provide accomodation for up to 18 people organised by the National Trust for Scotland 1 is a privately owned house, not permanently occupied, used by visitors to the island 1 is used as a workshop 3 are habitable but would require work such as the installation of indoor toilets and bathrooms to become permanent dwellings 1 house is currently being renovated 3 have no facilities at all and if it were not for the roofs would be ruins.1 of these will soon be a steading and workshop.
